languages.text: "Что ты..." {n}Мужчина осекается, а затем его уродливое лицо расплывается в хитрой ухмылке, а многочисленные язвы начинают наливаться гноем.{/n} "А ведь правда. Да... Кто-то смотрит за нами, бережет нас. Как я раньше этого не понимал?"

traits.locale_text: "Что ты несе..." {n}Мужчина осекается, когда печать умиротворения ложится на его уродливое лицо, а многочисленные язвы начинают наливаться гноем. {/n} "Да... Кто-то смотрит за нами, бережет нас. Как я раньше этого не понимал?"

languages.text: "What the..." {n}The man breaks off, and then his ugly face spreads into a sly grin, and his numerous sores begin to fill with pus.{/n} "It's true, isn't it? Yes... Someone is watching over us, keeping us safe. How did I not realise it before?"
languages.original_text: "Что ты..." {n}Мужчина осекается, а затем его уродливое лицо расплывается в хитрой ухмылке, а многочисленные язвы начинают наливаться гноем.{/n} "А ведь правда. Да... Кто-то смотрит за нами, бережет нас. Как я раньше этого не понимал?"

traits.locale_text: "What the..." {n}The man breaks off, and then his ugly face spreads into a sly grin, and his numerous sores begin to fill with pus. {/n}"It's true, isn't it? Yes... Someone is watching over us, keeping us safe. How did I not realise it before?"

"What the..." {n}The man breaks off, and then his ugly face spreads into a sly grin, and his numerous sores begin to fill with pus. {/n}"It's true, isn't it? Yes... Someone is watching over us, keeping us safe. How did I not realise it before?"

"What the..." {n}The man breaks off, and then his ugly face spreads into a sly grin, and his numerous sores begin to fill with pus. {/n}"It's true, isn't it? Yes... Someone is watching over us, keeping us safe. How did I not realise it before?"

"What the..." {n}The man breaks off, and then his ugly face spreads into a sly grin, and his numerous sores begin to fill with pus.{/n} "It's true, isn't it? Yes... Someone is watching over us, keeping us safe. How did I not realise it before?"

"What the..." {n}The man breaks off, and then his ugly face spreads into a sly grin, and his numerous sores begin to fill with pus.{/n} "It's true, isn't it? Yes... Someone is watching over us, keeping us safe. How did I not realise it before?"

languages.text: «Pero qué...». {n}El hombre no termina la frase, y luego su feo rostro esboza una sonrisa ladina que hace brotar pus de sus numerosas llagas por el esfuerzo.{/n} «Es verdad, ¿no? Sí... Hay alguien que vela por nosotros y nos mantiene a salvo. ¿Cómo no me he dado cuenta antes?».
languages.original_text: "What the..." {n}The man breaks off, and then his ugly face spreads into a sly grin, and his numerous sores begin to fill with pus.{/n} "It's true, isn't it? Yes... Someone is watching over us, keeping us safe. How did I not realise it before?"

traits.locale_text: «Pero qué...». {n}El hombre no termina la frase, y luego su feo rostro esboza una sonrisa ladina que hace brotar pus de sus numerosas llagas por el esfuerzo.{/n} «Es verdad, ¿no? Sí... Hay alguien que vela por nosotros y nos mantiene a salvo. ¿Cómo no me he dado cuenta antes?».

languages.text: 「何が…」{n}男は言葉を途中で途切れさせると、醜い顔でにやにやと笑顔を作り、無数のただれに膿がたまり始める。{/n}「本当なんだろう？そうだ…誰かが私たちを見守ってくれている。どうして今まで気づかなかったんだろう？」
languages.original_text: "What the..." {n}The man breaks off, and then his ugly face spreads into a sly grin, and his numerous sores begin to fill with pus.{/n} "It's true, isn't it? Yes... Someone is watching over us, keeping us safe. How did I not realise it before?"

traits.locale_text: 「何が…」{n}男は言葉を途中で途切れさせると、醜い顔でにやにやと笑顔を作り、無数のただれに膿がたまり始める。{/n}「本当なんだろう？そうだ…誰かが私たちを見守ってくれている。どうして今まで気づかなかったんだろう？」

languages.text: “你说什么……”{n}这个人突然住了口，随后丑陋的脸上露出了狡黠的笑容，身上无数疮疤开始流脓。{/n}“确实如此，对吧？没错……一直有人在守护着我们，保佑我们安然无恙。我之前怎么就没发现呢？”
languages.original_text: "What the..." {n}The man breaks off, and then his ugly face spreads into a sly grin, and his numerous sores begin to fill with pus.{/n} "It's true, isn't it? Yes... Someone is watching over us, keeping us safe. How did I not realise it before?"

traits.locale_text: “你说什么……”{n}这个人突然住了口，随后丑陋的脸上露出了狡黠的笑容，身上无数疮疤开始流脓。{/n}“确实如此，对吧？没错……一直有人在守护着我们，保佑我们安然无恙。我之前怎么就没发现呢？”

languages.text: "Was zum ..." {n}Der Mann unterbricht sich und verzieht sein Gesicht zu einem breiten Grinsen, während sich seine zahllosen Pusteln mit Eiter füllen.{/n} "Es ist wahr, oder? Ja ... Jemand wacht über uns, passt auf uns auf. Warum habe ich das bis jetzt nicht erkannt?"
languages.original_text: "What the..." {n}The man breaks off, and then his ugly face spreads into a sly grin, and his numerous sores begin to fill with pus.{/n} "It's true, isn't it? Yes... Someone is watching over us, keeping us safe. How did I not realise it before?"

traits.locale_text: "Was zum ..." {n}Der Mann unterbricht sich und verzieht sein Gesicht zu einem breiten Grinsen, während sich seine zahllosen Pusteln mit Eiter füllen.{/n} "Es ist wahr, oder? Ja ... Jemand wacht über uns, passt auf uns auf. Warum habe ich das bis jetzt nicht erkannt?"

languages.text: « Qu'est-ce que... » {n}L'homme s'interrompt, un rictus sournois s'épanouit sur sa vilaine trogne et ses nombreux chancres commencent à se remplir de pus.{/n} « Alors, c'est bien vrai ? Oui... Quelqu'un veille sur nous et assure notre sécurité. Comment ça se fait que je m'en sois pas rendu compte plus tôt ? »
languages.original_text: "What the..." {n}The man breaks off, and then his ugly face spreads into a sly grin, and his numerous sores begin to fill with pus.{/n} "It's true, isn't it? Yes... Someone is watching over us, keeping us safe. How did I not realise it before?"

traits.locale_text: « Qu'est-ce que... » {n}L'homme s'interrompt, un rictus sournois s'épanouit sur sa vilaine trogne et ses nombreux chancres commencent à se remplir de pus.{/n} « Alors, c'est bien vrai ? Oui... Quelqu'un veille sur nous et assure notre sécurité. Comment ça se fait que je m'en sois pas rendu compte plus tôt ? »

languages.text: "Nasıl..." {n}Adam duraksıyor. Ardından çirkin suratı genişleyerek sinsi bir gülümseme ortaya çıkarıyor. Sayısız çıbanı ise irinle dolmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Bu doğru, değil mi? Evet... Birileri bizi gözetiyor, bizi güvende tutuyor. Bunu daha önce nasıl fark etmedim?"
languages.original_text: "What the..." {n}The man breaks off, and then his ugly face spreads into a sly grin, and his numerous sores begin to fill with pus.{/n} "It's true, isn't it? Yes... Someone is watching over us, keeping us safe. How did I not realise it before?"
